original_title: A Short History of Drugs in the Valley
overview: A feature independent film by Brent Kado. Neonoir comedy about the idyllic heartland, confronting truths and folly of the American Dream gone bad. The Boss has a job for 3 of the Valley's top goons. Can they finish without f'ing up or will they become casualties of war? New music and remixes by Lotus, Amelia Eisenhauer (American Idol), Steel Wheels, Motet, Grammy winner Bobby Rush and more
title: A Short History of Drugs in the Valley
